title: Drosophila Evolution in a Lab Set Member 3

content.prompt: Which of the following claims is best supported by the data in Tables 1 and 2 ?

choices.label: The population of flies has undergone sympatric speciation.
The flies have developed a form of behavioral preference that could lead to divergence.
A postzygotic barrier has evolved between the populations of flies that prevents the birth of viable offspring.
The flies have undergone allopatric speciation, since only flies from the same chamber mated.
